ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisReappointment of LARRY JAMES CAMPBELL of Vancouver, British Columbia, as a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Vancouver Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective May 25, 2012.
